title: Eddie Admits He Has Been Cheating The System + Bobby Makes A Bet with a Listener + Disney Soundtrack Game + Bobby’s Mailbag: Listener Has A Bad Encounter with a Celebrity
itunes:title: Eddie Admits He Has Been Cheating The System + Bobby Makes A Bet with a Listener + Disney Soundtrack Game + Bobby’s Mailbag: Listener Has A Bad Encounter with a Celebrity
description:
Eddie makes a big confession on how he has been cheating the system. Several of the members are shocked! Bobby makes a bet with a listener on the West Virginia / Arkansas basketball game this weekend. Since Disney’s Encanto has the no. 1 album in the country right now…we play a game where you have to guess the movie based on the song. A listener writes into the mailbag needing advice on her bad run in with one of their favorite celebrities at the airport.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
